rules_text:
Target player gets three corruption counters.
Whenever you mill a card, inscribed creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Inscribe {2}{U}{B} [i]({2}{U}{B}: Exile this card from your hand inscribed on a creature you control. Whenever that creature attacks, its controller may cast a copy of the inscribed card without paying its mana cost. Inscribe only as a sorcery.)[/i]
